DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study evaluate safety efficacy Hydrophilic Acrylic Intraocular Lens cataract surgery
DOC.criteria: The patient good general ocular health , visionreducing cataract intend operative eye The patient willing able complete require postoperative visit . The patient willing sign statement inform consent . Preoperative The patient age 18 The patient prior intraocular surgery operative eye . The patient systemic disease ocular manifestation ( e.g . diabetes , complication immune deficiency syndrome ) , may contribute postoperative confound data interpretation . The patient 's bad see eye 20/70 worse . The patient multiple surgical procedure time implant . The patient chronic use steroid , immunosuppressive and/or antineoplastic agent . The patient acute infection , inflammation eye . Iris atrophy Proliferative diabetic retinopathy . Chronic , medically uncontrolled glaucoma Chronic uveitis , iritis , iridocyclitis rubeosis lid Rubella , traumatic congenital/developmental cataract . Severe retinal pathology ( e.g . retinal tear , detachment , etc ) . Operative Patient Exclusion Criteria Capsular rupture Vitreous loss Hyphema Zonular disinsertion Surgical Complications In event complication surgery , surgeon decide whether stability hydrophilic acrylic lens would compromise complication , e.g . event zonular damage major capsule rupture . If lens stability would compromise , hydrophilic acrylic lens implant surgeon make arrangement implant alternative lens .
